segments.text: Ugh, the sink is overflowing with dirty water, what a gross mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the edge, soaking the cabinet doors and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is widening, probably full of food bits from the dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe is splashed, and she doesn't even careâ€”nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are climbing around in this filth, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is wobbly on the wet floor; they'll slip into the muck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is open, inviting ants or worse into the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes piled up, probably not even clean yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is wiping a plate, but everything else is chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks clean and fresh, totally opposite.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how sloppy this whole setup is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage will make everything moldy and disgusting soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The secretive cookie grab just adds to the unclean vibe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off the faucet already; it's revolting to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen needs a serious cleanup right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
